meanings.definition: A diagram, plan, or drawing that outlines the components or structure of something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used simple schematics to explain how the machine works.
meanings.sent2: The engineer referred to the schematics to understand the building's layout.
meanings.sent3: The schematics of the puzzle made it easy for the child to put it back together.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a set of schematics, organizing thoughts neatly.
meanings.sent5: The schematics of the map were so detailed that every street was clear.

meanings.definition: A set of symbols or notations used to represent the components of a system or process.
meanings.sent1: The student studied the schematics to learn the symbols for electrical circuits.
meanings.sent2: The technician followed the schematics to fix the broken machinery.
meanings.sent3: The schematics looked like a secret code to the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: His words were like schematics, each one a piece of the bigger picture.
meanings.sent5: The schematics of the recipe made it easy for her to bake the cake.
